title: [Helgreth's Tavern, Taproom]
description: Boisterous laughter erupts often from the congregation of imbibing patrons seated at Helgreth's tables.  A scattering of flickering beeswax candles glimmer off the numerous brass fixtures and pristine inverted glassware suspended above the polished bar.  In their starched uniforms, off-duty military officers traverse the tumult of the taproom as they come and go from a plush sanguine velvet curtain marked by a heraldic Vaalorian buckler overhead.
